title: Cell biology: structure and composition
brief_description: Explores the structure of a cell, using microphotography, electron micrographs and models. Analyses protoplasm and describes the cell membrane, cytoplasm, nucleus, chromosomes and endoplasmic reticulum. Suitable for upper secondary level.
